extendedInfo.description: Your personal library at your finger tips!  Is there a book, movie or CD you want to check out?  Use the ALD Mobile app to check your library account and place a hold on that item, while also renewing, browsing and requesting other materials. We also have a great new way to search the catalog. No need to search by field, or enter full words - just type in the first couple of letters of words and see the search in action. So for materials written by Ralph Waldo Emerson, simply type âra wa emâ.Need something to do this weekend?  You can check out ALDâs program calendar for the latest programs and events on the app too!  Library locations, hours and contact us information are also available. If you are on the go â be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter.  Links can be found at ALD Mobile, as well.The ALD Mobile app has been created for you, so let us know if you would like to see any other features in the future.
